item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

All you have to do is add more c.getItems().addItem(ITEM ID, ITEM AMOUNT); Where you have your others

Dharoks item ids are like 4716-4722.

item.title: How do i add items when players log in?
item.dc:creator: @chrisrocks4122 chrisrocks4122
item.description:
@chrisrocks4122 wrote:

I am trying to add more items when players log in when they first start. I have added 10m but I want full dhoraks, veracs, ect with the log in.
someone please help me?

	c.getItems().addItem(995,10000000);

c.sendMessage(“Welcome to Nationalpkz v1 by Defence!”);
c.sendMessage(“We hope you enjoy our source”);
c.getPA().showInterface

(17250);
c.canChangeAppearance = true;
}

public int getWearingAmount() {
	int count = 0;
	for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length;

j++) {
if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0)
count++;
}
return count;
}
